articles.title: ‘Why is Shubman Gill selected for T20 World Cup squad?’ Cricket legend says BCCI chooses GT captain ‘even if he fails’ | Mint - Mint
articles.description: ‘Shubman Gill is totally out of form. Why is he selected for the team?’ said the cricket legend while advocating Ruturaj Gaikwad's place in India's T20 World Cup squad.
articles.content: Ruturaj Gaikwad's exclusion and Shubman Gills inclusion as a reserve player in Indias T20 World Cup squad have irked former Indian cricketer Krishnamachari Srikkanth. The legendary cricketer, who was… [+2111 chars]
